questions.body:
I come from Cambridge, a beautiful city in the east of England. It is on the River Cam and has a population of about 120,000. My home town is especially famous for its university. Many famous people studied here, such as Isaac Newton and Charles Darwin. There are lots of old buildings and churches to visit. Students and tourists enjoy trips along the river by boat.

Cambridge is 80 kilometres from London. London is in the south of England and it is on the River Thames. It has a population of about seven and a half million, so it is bigger and busier than Cambridge. It is about 2,000 years old, and it is famous for Big Ben, Buckingham Palace and Tower Bridge.
answer:
I come from Cambridge, a beautiful city in the east of England. It is on the River Cam and has a population of about 120,000. My home town is especially famous for its university. Many famous people studied here, such as Isaac Newton and Charles Darwin. There are lots of old buildings and churches to visit. Students and tourists enjoy trips along the river by boat.
Cambridge is 80 kilometres from London. London is in the south of England and it is on the River Thames. It has a population of about seven and a half million, so it is bigger and busier than Cambridge. It is about 2,000 years old, and it is famous for Big Ben, Buckingham Palace and Tower Bridge.

questions.directions: 你有90秒钟的时间熟悉屏幕上的短文，并作朗读准备。在听到“开始录音”的信号后，请在90秒钟内朗读短文一遍。

groups.title: (二) 根据英语/汉语提示进行表达

questions.body: 我叫Bob。世界上有很多种音乐。在所有类型的音乐中，我最喜欢摇滚乐。有些人认为摇滚乐太吵了，但我不同意。我认为摇滚乐充满激情和活力。每当我感到沮丧的时候，我就会听摇滚乐。它可以使我振作起来，鼓励我。
answer: My name is Bob. There are many kinds of music in the world. Among them, I like rock music best. Some people think rock music is too noisy. But I don't agree. I think rock music is full of passion and energy. Every time when I feel upset, I will listen to rock music. It can cheer me up and encourage me.@@I'm Bob. There are lots of music in the world. Among them, my favorite is rock music. There are some people who think that rock music is too noisy for them. They don't like it at all. But I don't agree with them. I think rock music can bring me much passion and energy. When I feel upset each time, I will listen to rock music. It can cheer me up and encourage me.

body_urls.content: My name is Bob. There are many kinds of music in the world. Among them, I like rock music best. Some people think rock music is too noisy. But I don't agree. I think rock music is full of passion and energy. Every time when I feel upset, I will listen to rock music. It can cheer me up and encourage me.

questions.directions: 你将听到一篇英文短文，短文听两遍，并在屏幕上看到该短文的汉语要点提示。在听完短文并做60秒钟准备后，请根据听到的内容和屏幕提示进行复述，复述内容需包含所有要点。录音时间为90秒钟。

groups.title: (三) 听短文并根据要点复述

questions.body:
1) When is Bob going to graduate?

2) What did Mr Smith teach?

3) What did Mr Smith ask students to do on the first day?

4) Why did Bob make up his mind to study hard?

5) When did Bob go to the English corner every week?

6) What did Bob want to be in the future?
answer: My name is Bob. I am going to graduate from middle school next week. I still remember my first day of middle school. In Mr Smith's English class, he asked us to introduce ourselves in English. But my English was so poor that I couldn't say a complete sentence. I was very embarrassed. But he encouraged me instead of getting angry. So I made up my mind to study English well. I listened carefully in class and went to the English corner every Friday. My English has improved a lot. In the future, I want to become an English teacher like Mr Smith.@@I am Bob. I will graduate from middle school next week. My first day of middle school was unforgettable for me. Mr Smith is an English teacher. In his class, he asked us to make an English self-introduction. But my English was very poor and I couldn't say a complete sentence. Mr Smith didn't get angry but encouraged me. Therefore, I made up my mind to study English well. After that, I listened very carefully in class. I also went to the English corner every Friday. My English has improved a lot. I want to be an English teacher in the future.

body_urls.content: My name is Bob. I am going to graduate from middle school next week. I still remember my first day of middle school. In Mr Smith's English class, he asked us to introduce ourselves in English. But my English was so poor that I couldn't say a complete sentence. I was very embarrassed. But he encouraged me instead of getting angry. So I made up my mind to study English well. I listened carefully in class and went to the English corner every Friday. My English has improved a lot. In the future, I want to become an English teacher like Mr Smith.
body_urls.name: WH-JH7U10-C1.mp3

groups.title: (六) 听长对话后口头回答问题

body_urls.content:
M: This is classical music, isn't it? Can you hear the violin and the piano? It's so beautiful. Is this by Strauss or Mozart? 
W: It's by Mozart. I love his music. Do you know anything about him, Tony? 
M: Was he German? 
W: No, he was born in Salzburg, Austria. It's a beautiful city!

directions_urls.name: 59ad67d8019c4c7b8e75.mp3
directions_urls.content: 第一节，听两遍短文，然后根据所听内容和提示将所缺信息补全。

body_urls.name: Q5.mp3
body_urls.content:
Hello, everyone. I’m Chris. This week I’m going to tell you about my favorite hotel. It’s in the west of the country and the best time to go there is June. It’s called the White Hotel because it’s always painted white. It’s one of the oldest hotels in this country. You can see the sea or mountains from every room. But it’s difficult to book a bedroom there because there are only thirty-six of them and the hotel can’t take more than fifty guests at one time.

Visitors can also enjoy the hotel restaurant. People go there from all over the world to eat its fish. Have a try soon.

subs.directions: 第一节，听两遍短文，然后根据所听内容和提示将所缺信息补全。

subs.body: Chris told us about his favorite hotel today.
answer: Chris told us about his favorite hotel today. The hotel is the White Hotel, because it is always painted white. It is in the west of the country. The best time to go there is June. The hotel is one of the oldest hotels in this country. People can see the sea or mountains from every room. They can also enjoy the hotel restaurant. But the problem is that it's difficult to book a bedroom. The hotel can't take more than fifty guests at one time.@@Chris told us about his favorite hotel today. The hotel is in the west of the country. It's painted white and is called the White Hotel. The best time to go there is June. It's one of the oldest hotels in this country. People can see the sea or mountains from every room. It's hard to book a bedroom there because it can't take more than fifty guests at one time. And the restaurant is very popular too. The fish is very delicious.

directions_urls.name: 0d6062c641e34043ad15.mp3

body_urls.name: Q5.mp3
body_urls.content:
Hello, everyone. I’m Chris. This week I’m going to tell you about my favorite hotel. It’s in the west of the country and the best time to go there is June. It’s called the White Hotel because it’s always painted white. It’s one of the oldest hotels in this country. You can see the sea or mountains from every room. But it’s difficult to book a bedroom there because there are only thirty-six of them and the hotel can’t take more than fifty guests at one time.

Visitors can also enjoy the hotel restaurant. People go there from all over the world to eat its fish. Have a try soon.

directions_urls.name: 51e31e458f0c49759602.mp3
directions_urls.content: 第一节（共5小题；每小题1分，共5分）听下面一篇短文，根据所听内容和提示将所缺信息填写在相应位置上。听短文前，你将有30秒钟的读题时间；听完后，你将有90秒钟的答题时间。每空一词，短文读两遍。

body_urls.name: WF-JH6M04-B1.mp3
body_urls.content: On the third day of our camping trip, Ben told us that if we saw a bear, we should not make any sudden moves. We did not have a gun to keep ourselves safe. The next day, I saw a baby bear playing with some sticks and stones. His mother arrived soon, and I was so afraid that my blood went cold. I did not move until the bears walked away. Then I ran back to my friends as fast as I could.

subs.directions:
第一节（共5小题；每小题1分，共5分）

听下面一篇短文，根据所听内容和提示将所缺信息填写在相应位置上。听短文前，你将有30秒钟的读题时间；听完后，你将有90秒钟的答题时间。每空一词，短文读两遍。

subs.body: On the 1)      day of our camping trip, Ben told us that if we saw a bear, we should not make any 2)      moves. We did not have a gun to keep ourselves safe. The next day, I saw a baby bear playing with some 3)      and stones. His mother arrived 4)     , and I was so afraid that my blood went 5)     . I did not move until the bears walked away. Then I ran back to my friends as fast as I could.
answer: On the third day of our camping trip, Ben told us that if we saw a bear, we should not make any sudden moves. We did not have a gun to keep ourselves safe. The next day, I saw a baby bear playing with some sticks and stones. His mother arrived soon, and I was so afraid that my blood went cold. I did not move until the bears walked away. Then I ran back to my friends as fast as I could.
